name: Bejeweled: Arcade
description:
Bejeweled: Arcade is a Fan-Made Bejeweled Game inspired by many other Fangames, it mainly focuses on the gameplay of Bejeweled 1, No Special Gems, Basic Gameplay and Basic Design
If there are any bugs please report it to me, thanks! :D
(if it takes a while to load just wait a while, the file is pretty big so)
